attributes.action: Ban all Halal meat production and Ban the practice of halal slaughter in UK.
attributes.additional_details: Ban all halal meat slaughter practices in the UK and also the sale of halal meat in the UK and the import of halal meat into the UK.
attributes.background: Ban all halal meat slaughter practices in the UK and also the sale of halal meat in the UK and the import of halal meat into the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban non-stun slaughter in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700557
